author: weaver
msg: Added the ability to set/add portlet parameters at the registry level.

author: morciuch
msg: 1. Bug # 18829  - Screens may now be optionally included in portlet template search (see portlet.global.search property in jr.props).
2. Bug # 18824 - JSP templates located outside of WEB-INF may now be used as portlets
3. Bug # 18362  - Replaced usage of deprecated LocaleDetector with JetspeedLocalizationService. Template locator service now correctly detects language changes. Patch by Kim Thrysoe.

author: morciuch
msg: Fixed the problem with last login timestamp not being recorded (see Bugzilla issue# 18765).

author: morciuch
msg: 1. Added packaging of jetspeed localization bundles into the .jar.
2. Added goals for local repository deployment (missing in maven-1.8)
